story: You are at home. From here you will start your journey in finding the king Candy.
nav: press 1 to go to gingerbread forest and press 2 to go to vanilla castle

story: You are in gingerbread forest. You're hungry and there's nothing to eat.
nav: press 1 to go to cupcake mountains and press 2 to go to pieberry woods

story: You are in cupcake mountains. You feel very cold.
nav: press 1 to go to ice palace and press 2 to go to blueberry pond

story: You are in vanilla castle. The Saga king serves you food.
nav: press 1 to go to chocolate lake and press 2 to go to icecream sea

story: You are in pieberry woods. You find peace here.
nav: press 1 to go to coconut mountains and press 2 to go to choco lake

story: You are in chocolate lake. The lake is very beautiful.
nav: press 1 to go to peanut butter house and press 2 to go to rasberry forest

story: You are in peanut butter house. You're served delicious meal.
nav: press 1 to go to choco lake

story: You are in icecream sea. You are totally amazed by the sea.
nav: press 1 to go to cadbury land and press 2 to go to creamy slopes

story: You are in ice palace. The Ice queen welcomes you.
nav: press 1 to go to creamy slopes and press 2 to go back to home

story: You have reached rasberry forest. The forest is very dense and scary.
nav: press 1 to go to blackberry palace , press 2 to go to frosted palace and press 3 to go to butter creamy palace

story: You have reached coconut mountains. You feel happy here.
nav: press 1 to go to butter creamy palace and press 2 to go back to home

story: You are in cadburry land which is closer to demon's palace. Be alert.
nav: press 1 to go to lollipup palace and press 2 to go back to home

story: You are in blueberry pond. You are totally mesmerized by this beautiful lake.
nav: press 1 to go to frosted palace and press 2 to go back to home

story: You have reached choco lake. The lake of chocos. You can eat chocos as much as you want.
nav: press 1 to go to candy castle, press 2 to go to vanilla castle and press 3 to go to lollipup palace

story: You are in creamy slopes. Be careful here. You might slip.
nav: press 1 to go to gingerbread forest and press 2 to go to icecream sea

story: You are in blackberry palace. The demon Jolly lives here. The demon killed you.
You are in butter creamy palace. Prince Butter lives here.
nav: press 1 to go to cupcake mountains and press 2 to go to chocolate lake

story: You are in lollipup palace. Princess Lollipop lives here.
nav: press 1 to go to ice palace and press 2 to go back to home

story: You are in frosted palace. Queen Frostine lives here.
nav: press 1 to go to peanut butter bouse and press 2 to go to creamy slopes

story: You have reached the destination. You found Candy king.
